Title: The Seed
Description: Once the seed of faith takes root, it cannot be blown away, even by the strongest wind – Now that’s a blessing.

Title: Winners never quit
Description: Your hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.

Title: Autonomus
Description: AUTONOMOUS is an animated cyberpunk thriller centered around a motorcycle gang of traffickers in a world of autonomous vehicles. Yuri and her brother Nyx face off against the Metro Task Force as they transport an important package to a client.

Title: The Present
Description: The film tells the story of a boy who rather spends his time indoors playing videogames instead of discovering what’s waiting outside. One day his Mum decides to get a little surprise for her son, which makes it hard for him to concentrate on his video game any longer.

Title: wildebeest
Description: A couple of wildebeest contemplate crossing a river.
